description:
Mr. Carp is a master of cue cards. ABCiee ends up having to do cue cards one day and it`s a lot harder than excepted! And then, something terrible happens during the live broadcast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanpe Master no Michi wa Kewashii!
The Path of a Cue Card Master Is Rough, Ciee!
カンペマスターの道はケワシ~!
